mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME, WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME, WHDW.DPRTNAME WHDW_DRPTNAME, SHR.USERNAME||' '||SHR.REALNAME SHR_REALNAME, SHDW.DPRTNAME SHDW_DRPTNAME, PFR.USERNAME||' '||PFR.REALNAME PFR_REALNAME, PFDW.DPRTNAME PFDW_DRPTNAME, to_char(B.SXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') SJSXRQ, ( CASE WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '未生效' WHEN B.ZT = 2 THEN '待生效' WHEN B.ZT = 3 THEN '生效' WHEN B.ZT = 7 THEN '失效' WHEN B.ZT = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.ZT = 9 THEN '关闭' WHEN B.ZT = 10 THEN '完成' END ) STATUS_NAME, ( CASE WHEN B.ZXBS = 0 THEN '未生效' WHEN B.ZXBS = 1 THEN '生效' WHEN B.ZXBS = 2 THEN '失效' END ) ZT_NAME, ( CASE WHEN B.SPZT = 1 THEN '未审批' WHEN B.SPZT = 2 THEN '已审批' WHEN B.SPZT = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.SPZT = 4 THEN '关闭' WHEN B.SPZT = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.SPZT = 6 THEN '批准驳回' END ) SP_STATUS, ( CASE WHEN B.YXX = 0 THEN '无效' WHEN B.YXX = 1 THEN '有效' END ) YXX_NAME, '定检项目编号:'||B.DJBH || ' ' || ( CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END ) REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END ) DATA_VERSION
FROM B_G_012_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.ZDRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.ZDBMID LEFT JOIN T_USER SHR ON SHR.ID = B.SHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT SHDW ON SHDW.ID = B.SHBMID LEFT JOIN T_USER PFR ON PFR.ID = B.PFRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT PFDW ON PFDW.ID = B.PFBMID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from B_G_012_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO

SELECT * FROM(
SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION , WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME, A.FJZCH FJZCH_NAME, A.REC_HD REC_HD FROM B_G_01202_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN (select MAINID, WM_CONCAT((CASE WHEN REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END)||' '||FJZCH) AS FJZCH, WM_CONCAT((CASE WHEN REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束' WHEN REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END)) AS REC_HD from B_G_0120201_REC WHERE REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY MAINID) A on B.ID = A.MAINID WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.FJZCH IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION , WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME, A.FJZCH FJZCH_NAME, A.REC_HD REC_HD FROM B_G_01202_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN (select MAINID,REC_CZLS, WM_CONCAT((CASE WHEN REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END)||' '||FJZCH) AS FJZCH, WM_CONCAT((CASE WHEN REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束' WHEN REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END)) AS REC_HD from B_G_0120201_REC GROUP BY MAINID,REC_CZLS) A on B.ID = A.MAINID AND B.REC_CZLS = A.REC_CZLS WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.FJZCH IS NOT NULL AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_G_012_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G_012_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )
) A ORDER BY A.NBXH ASC
